revision.comment: move lang= to 1= in {{was fwotd}}; move lang= to 1= in {{IPA}}
revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== {{was fwotd|nci|2014|February|6}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|nci|xochiqualquauhtla}}, {{l|nci|xuchiqualquauhtla}} {{qualifier|obsolete spellings}} ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|nci|xōchihcualcuahuitl|tlah|t1=fruit tree}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|[ʃoː.t͡ʃiʔ.kʷaɬˈkʷaʍ.t͡ɬaʔ]}} ===Noun=== {{nci-noun|loc|xōchihcualcuauhtlah}} # [[orchard]] #* '''1571''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 160r. col. 2. #*: '''Xochiqualquauhtla'''. tierra de frutales. #*:: '''Xochiqualquauhtla'''. land planted with fruit trees. #* ''Idem'', f. 161v. col. 2. #*: '''Xuchiqualquauhtla'''. arboleda de frutales, o enxer- / tal. #*:: '''Xuchiqualquauhtla'''. a grove of fruit trees, or a nursery for grafted fruit trees. ====Related terms==== * {{l|nci|xōchihcualloh}} ===References=== * {{cite-book|author=[[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]]|year=1571|title=[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]|publisher=Editorial Porrúa|pages=160, 161}} [[Category:nci:Fruits]]
